instructions: Go to Settings > Sounds & Haptics > Ringtone (on an iPhone with system haptics ) or Settings > Sounds > Ringtone (on other iPhone models). Do any of the following: Turn vibrations on or off. Set the default ringtone. Tap Tone Store to buy more ringtones.
Open the Contacts app . Select a contact, tap Edit, tap Ringtone, then choose a ringtone.
